props.description: Country level data on ESG topics has many relevant uses. An obvious use lies within the financial sector, where institutional investors are increasingly ESG aware. The govvies.info world map can be used to identify countries one would or would not like to be exposed to. Another use case is to target countries where the most impact on an ESG topic can be made.

data.title: Investors
data.description: Align capital investments with your ESG risk appetite.

data.title: Corporate Strategists
data.description: Create maximum impact by focusing on certain countries.

data.description: Compare countries and target efforts to increase improvements.
